description: Try our easy to follow Orange & Soy Chicken With Simple Fried Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fried rice,Orange,Quick & easy dinner,Sausage,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Rice,Chicken,Dairy free
name: Orange & Soy Chicken With Simple Fried Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2.5 tbs vegetable oil (or rice bran oil)

recipeInstructions.text: Zest and juice 1 orange. Combine 1 tbs zest, 1/4 cup juice, 2 tbs soy, garlic and honey in a dish. Add chicken and turn to coat.

Heat 2 tsp vegetable oil in a large non-stick frying pan over high heat. Cook sausage, stirring, for 2 minutes or until golden and crisp. Transfer to a plate. Reheat same pan over high heat and add egg, swirling to cover base of pan. Cook for 2 minutes or until just set. Transfer to a plate. Roll into a log, then slice.
In same pan, heat 1 tbs vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook, turning, for 8-10 minutes or until cooked through.

Meanwhile, heat remaining vegetable oil and sesame oil in a wok or large frying pan over high heat. Add rice, stirring, for 2-3 minutes or until heated through. Add remaining soy and cook, stirring, for 1 minute.
Add sausage, egg and onion. Cook, stirring, for 1 minute, or until heated through.
Slice chicken. Serve buk choy topped with fried rice and chicken. Slice remaining orange. Garnish with coriander and orange slices.
